Info.title: AIRR Data File
Info.description: AIRR Data File written by AIRR Standards Python Library

study.study_title: Naive B-cell receptor heavy chain repertoire of celiac patients and healthy controls

sample.cell_isolation: the cell isolation was done using FACSAria with the markers CD19+, CD27-, IgD+, IgA-, IgG-, followed by PCR with primers to IgD and IgM
